channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Jira Service Management Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Jira Service Management Server

item.title: CVE-2021-43949|2024-10-04T18:11:30.539Z -- atlassian -- jira%20service%20management%20server
item.description: Affected versions of Atlassian Jira Service Management Server and Data Center allow authenticated remote attackers to view private objects via a Broken Access Control vulnerability in the Custom Fields feature. The affected versions are before version 4.21.0.

item.title: CVE-2021-43943|2024-10-04T18:12:24.195Z -- atlassian -- jira%20service%20management%20server
item.description: Affected versions of Atlassian Jira Service Management Server and Data Center allow attackers with administrator privileges to inject arbitrary HTML or JavaScript via a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the "Object Schema" field of /secure/admin/InsightDefaultCustomFieldConfig.jspa. The affected versions are before version 4.21.0.
